channel.title: Bio-digital jazz, man
channel.description: Given that you're following this blog, and the fact that you even use RSS in the first place, you may be intrigued to know that I "hand-crafted" this RSS feed. Why do we always set up some convoluted auto-generation pipeline for RSS? "It's just text files, y'all."

item.title: Books about the history of computing
item.description: A list of books about the history of computing, most of which I have not read.

item.title: pCrowDoodle, my "desirable difficulty" laptop
item.description: First impressions of my RPi laptop.

item.title: Axioms of Systemantics
item.description: Systemantics is a silly little book by John Gall with some interesting ideas about why systems fail.

item.title: Transistor first reported as "Little Brain Cell"
item.description: Time magazine's first report on the transistor, back in 1948.

item.title: How to program an Arduino Uno in Assembly
item.description: An end-to-end tutorial on how to create a blinky program for the Arduino Uno R3 in Assembly.
